szkauhandler.trade.request: Player [%s] wants to trade with you. They offer [%s][%d], you provide [%s][%d]%s, note: [%s]. Do you accept? Use /szkauhandler %s acce/deny/barg to respond
szkauhandler.trade.failed: Trade failed, insufficient items in inventory or items do not meet rules
szkauhandler.trade.failed.other: Trade failed, %s has insufficient items or items do not meet rules
szkauhandler.trade.failed.verify: Trade failed, item transfer result inconsistent with agreement
szkauhandler.trade.bargain: [%s] has requested a price modification. You will receive [%d] and [%d]. Do you accept? Use /szkauhandler %s acce/deny to reply
szkauhandler.error.no_trade: No pending trade found with this player
szkauhandler.error.no_item: You must hold an item in your offhand
szkauhandler.error.target_banned: Target player is banned from trading
szkauhandler.error.item_blocked: The item you offered is blocked from trading
szkauhandler.error.not_participant: You are not a participant in this trade
szkauhandler.error.amount_range: Item %d amount must be between 1 and %d
szkauhandler.error.infinite_mode: Only OP can enable infinite mode
szkauhandler.marklist.header:
Current server trade codes
|Original Name Item ID Code
szkauhandler.config.player_banned: Player %s has been banned from trading for %d seconds
szkauhandler.config.player_unbanned: Player %s's trading ban has been lifted
szkauhandler.config.item_blocked: Item %s has been blocked from trading
szkauhandler.config.item_blocked_player: Player %s has been blocked from trading item %s
